archimate:Requirement.name: 4.54.3 Collaboration platform security control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Collaboration platforms should be configured to operate securely by: requiring authentication before users are granted access to platforms disabling unauthorised features (e.g. message transcripts, externally facing APIs or user self-registration) protecting the integrity of messages (e.g. by the use of digital signatures) logging specified security-related events (e.g. to check for unauthorised activity, investigate potential breach-es and maintain records for regulato-ry purposes).
